InstitutionName: Physikalisch Technische Bundesanstalt, Charite Universitaetsmedizin Berlin
TaskDescription: In this phantom setup, there is an inflatable box underneath the gelatine phantom that is filled with air in a fixed time distance of 2 seconds very briefly and simulates physiological movement like the heart beat pulsation. Movement is turned on or off according to the respective task label (mov). Additionally, an electric dipole is activated or turned off at 13 Hz or 7 Hz frequency respectively.
